org.itemscript.core
Interface HasSystem

All Known Subinterfaces:
JsonArray, JsonBoolean, JsonContainer, JsonItem, JsonNative, JsonNull, JsonNumber, JsonObject, JsonScalar, JsonString, JsonSystem, JsonValue
All Known Implementing Classes:
Accumulator, Analyzer, AndFunction, B64idFunction, ConnectorBase, ConstantFunction, DataUrlFunction, EmptyFunction, EqualsFunction, Expression, FieldFunction, FileConnector, FunctionBase, GwtCookieConnector, GwtHttpConnector, GwtJavaScriptConnector, GwtJsonCreator, GwtJsonpConnector, HandlerBase, HtmlEscapeFunction, HttpConnector, ItemscriptContainer, ItemscriptCreator, ItemscriptFoundry, ItemscriptItem, ItemscriptSystem, LiteralFunction, LoadFunction, MemConnector, MultipleGet, NotFunction, NumericLiteralFunction, ObjectAnalyzer, ObjectTemplate, OrFunction, OverlayObject, ParseTsvFunction, ParseTsvWithHeaderLineFunction, PrettyHtmlFunction, ResourceConnector, Schema, Segment, StandardJsonCreator, StringAnalyzer, SubstringFunction, Template, TemplateExec, Text, TextTemplate, Url, UrlEncodeFunction, UrlFactory, UuidFunction, ValidateAsBooleanFunction, ValidateAsNumberFunction, ValidateFunction, WeakArray, WeakContainer, WeakObject
public interface HasSystem

Objects implementing this interface have a reference to the JsonSystem object.

Author:
Jacob Davies
jacob@itemscript.org

Method Summary
 JsonSystem system()
          Get the JsonSystem object associated with this object.
 

Method Detail

system

JsonSystem system()
Get the JsonSystem object associated with this object.

Returns:
The JsonSystem.
